title: Full-Time Wix Studio Web Designer
job_overview:
Description:

I’m hiring a full-time Wix Studio website designer to create clean, professional websites fast. This is a stable, long-term role with guaranteed monthly pay. You’ll work directly under me—no client communication, no coding—just follow my instructions and deliver great-looking sites.

Responsibilities:

Build 2 to 3 websites per day (template-style sites).

Use Wix Studio only (no classic Wix).

Follow clear instructions froUpgrade to see actual info – no client contact.

Revise quickly if needed.

Requirements:

Wix Studio experience required – show your portfolio (no exceptions).

Fast and professional – must hit 2–3 sites daily.

Fluent English for communication.

Fast, stable internet connection.

Reliable and disciplined.

To Apply (No Application Without This Will Be Considered):

Send 3–5 examples of your Wix Studio website designs.

Confirm your full-time availability (8 hours/day, 5–6 days/week).
